channel.title: Need Help On [Pi] 317 Client
channel.description:
My client (source and client is from ErasedPkz) will not turn into a jar file. Im trying to make the entire client into a jar, but it just won't connect after I do. I cannot find half of the files Ric's Tut. is asking for. :\
I will make whoever does it for me and/or shows me how to do it STAFF on my upcoming server. I know it may not sound like much.. but that's all I can really do for repay. "\
Thanks in advance everyone!!

item.title: Need Help On [Pi] 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

dawgs007:

Well… mind showing me? I used jarmaker and get errors in the jar file after I start it back up. It wont load the client from jar correctly.

Then your following the tutorial wrong, I’ve jarred literary 100’s of clients and not one tutorial failed.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

  1. Hybrid pvp is webclient ready
  2. use jar maker
  3. Rics tut is not for pi
